column5: either dominant object-subject order or no dominant order
dominant word order is subject-first (including SVO and SOV orders)
dominant word order order is not subject-first (including verb-initial and object-initial orders)
there is overt morphological marking of lexical arguments (subject and/or object)
there is no overt marking of lexical arguments (subject and object)
there is head marking of lexical arguments (subject and/or object)
there is no head marking of lexical arguments (subject and object)
there is dependent marking of lexical arguments (subject and/or object)
there is no dependent marking of lexical arguments (subject and object)
